content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")

.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")

//å¤§å†™å­—æ¯

.replace(/5\_â€‹/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_â€‹/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_â€‹/g,"e")

.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")

.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")

.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
å¯†æ–‡=unescape(content)
